document.full_text: bp has agreed to pay a $25 million civil penalty plus interest to settle a federal investigation into a 2006 pipeline oil spill on alaska's north slope, according to court papers filed on tuesday.
document.title: bp to pay $25 million penalty over alaska oil spill
lines_and_colors: bp has agreed to pay a $25 million civil penalty plus interest to settle a federal investigation into a 2006 pipeline oil spill on alaska's north slope, according to court papers filed on tuesday.
